card_1.subtitle: Active Role in Business
card_1.text: Each NFT “UNCO888” is 1 vote in the UNCO Board for the current owner: for influencing strategy and business decisions with direct connection to management.

card_2.subtitle: NFT ”UNCO888” grows with the  Company!
card_2.text_1: It is combining short-term returns with long-term value.
card_2.text_2: Up to 4x+* in the next round* or in P2P

card_3.subtitle: “UNCO888” is a bearer option contract
card_3.text_1: Can be exchanged once for shares in the company*
card_3.text_2: Important: When exchanging for comp any shares, KYC is a mandatory process.*
